summary: A test suite that validates the functionality of the AltCLIP model, covering its initialization, loading from pretrained weights, forward pass behavior, handling of hidden states and attentions, gradient tracking, and compatibility with TorchScript and pipeline configurations.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the AltCLIP model for production use, enabling safe integration into applications that rely on multimodal embeddings and ensuring regressions are caught early.
